raw_excerpt:
so im really fascinated by llms and im experimenting with it
when i tried the gpt-oss 20B on groq i thought it was fast enough for a realtime generation kinda setting
so i made it, not a single line of html is written, everything is generated on the fly by gpt-oss

but yeah lmk what you guys think https://gen.soham.sh

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44996328
Points: 2
# Comments: 2
speedrun: A developer created a website called Gen that generates all its pages in real-time using AI, specifically the gpt-oss 20B model. This means no HTML is pre-written; everything is created on the fly. This matters now as it showcases the growing capability of AI to handle dynamic content generation efficiently.
why_it_matters: For developers and tech enthusiasts, this demonstrates how AI can streamline web development, making it faster and more flexible.
On a broader scale, this innovation could reshape content creation strategies for businesses, allowing for more personalized and responsive user experiences.

lenses.eli12: Imagine a chef who can whip up a dish right when you order it, instead of preparing meals in advance. That's what this AI does for web pages, creating them instantly. This matters because it could change how we interact with websites, making them more engaging and tailored to our needs.
lenses.pm: For product managers, this innovation highlights a growing user expectation for instant, personalized content. It offers a competitive edge by enabling rapid updates and tailored experiences. A practical next step is to explore how real-time AI generation could enhance your product's user engagement.
lenses.engineer: This approach uses the gpt-oss 20B model for real-time content generation, which is efficient but may face limitations in scalability and complexity. The developer caches initial results to manage costs, indicating a need for balancing performance and expenses. Understanding these dynamics is crucial for future projects.
